changeSet.sql: WITH cte_dbTable_getNonEqualProjekts AS ( SELECT dbt.id AS [dbt.id] ,dbt.fk_project_id AS [dbt.fk_project_id] ,dbtc.id AS [dbtc.id] ,dbtc.fk_project_id AS [dbtc.fk_project_id] FROM db_table dbt LEFT JOIN db_table_context dbtc ON dbtc.id = dbt.fk_db_table_context_id WHERE dbtc.fk_project_id <> dbt.fk_project_id ) , cte_DiffOf_dbTableContext AS ( -- Diese Kombination an Projekten fehlt db_table_context EintrÃ¤ge (welche aktuell verwendet werden): SELECT DISTINCT [dbt.fk_project_id] ,[dbtc.id] ,dbtc_2.* FROM cte_dbTable_getNonEqualProjekts gNEP LEFT JOIN db_table_context dbtc_2 ON dbtc_2.id=gNEP.[dbtc.id] ) INSERT INTO db_table_context (fk_project_id, name, description, prefix) SELECT diff.[dbt.fk_project_id] ,diff.name ,diff.description ,diff.prefix FROM cte_DiffOf_dbTableContext diff EXCEPT SELECT exc.fk_project_id,exc.name,exc.description,exc.prefix FROM db_table_context exc INNER JOIN cte_DiffOf_dbTableContext excdiff ON exc.fk_project_id = excdiff.[dbt.fk_project_id] AND exc.name = excdiff.name
changeSet.comment: Find usings of db_table_context in db_table which differs in fk_project_id. This causes RBAC errors, if users may only see one of the used projects. This script duplicates db_table_context entries with the used project_id in db_table (will then exists n-times). Used objects: db_table_context
